Name: Pro Cycling Manager 2018
About the game: LEAD YOUR TEAM TO VICTORY Step into the shoes of sports manager and lead your pro cycling team through a challenge-packed 2018 season. Compete in over 200 races across 500 stages around the world, including famous Tours such as La Vuelta and the iconic Tour de France. It’s up to you to make all decisions for your team: hiring the best cyclists and staff, contract negotiations, sponsoring, race scheduling, training… During the race, choose the finest tactics to lead your riders to victory. Play solo or online multiplayer in leagues or clans with up to 16 players and prove to everyone who is the best pro cycling manager! NEW FEATURES Advanced contract and negotiation management in Career mode with in-depth transfer and recruitment mechanics. Deeper progression system in Pro Cyclist mode, with more possibilities than ever to personalize and build your cyclist. Enhanced in-race immersion with many improvements, including bigger breakaways and more realistic and aggressive AI during sprints.
